data.comment: The match is underway. Beerschot have kicked-off.
Goal! Xavier Mercier gives Oud-Heverlee a 0-1 lead in Antwerp.
In the minute 21, Tarik Tissoudali is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Beerschot move into a 2-1 lead through a Tarik Tissoudali header.
Tom Pietermaat for Beerschot has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 37, The away team have replaced Derrick Tshimanga with Vaclav Jemelka. This is the first substitution made today by Marc Brys.
Nicolas Laforge blows to end the first-half.
Ismaila Coulibaly (Beerschot) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Oud-Heverlee with the kick-off.
At Olympisch Stadion, Jan Van den Bergh has been yellow-carded for the home team.
It's now 3-1 in Antwerp as Ryan Sanusi scores for Beerschot.
In the minute 63, Marc Brys is making the team's second substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Moussa Al-Taamari replacing Mathieu Maertens.
Great finish from Raphael Holzhauser to give Beerschot a 4-1 lead.
Joren Dom (Beerschot) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Dario Van Den Buijs is replacing Ismaila Coulibaly for Beerschot at Olympisch Stadion.
Oud-Heverlee have been given a penalty...
Pierre Bourdin (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 80, Olivier Myny is replacing Barnabas Bese for the away team.
Penalty! Nicolas Laforge points to the spot, great chance for Oud-Heverlee...
Goal! Thomas Henry nets a penalty for Oud-Heverlee. They now trail 4-2.
In the minute 83, Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a second substitution, with Pierre Bourdin replacing Yan Vorogovskiy.
Vaclav Jemelka is booked for the away team.
The home team have replaced Raphael Holzhauser with Denis Prychynenko. This is the third substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
The match is over. Final score 4-2.
